Upgrades.Name: Improved Diagnostics: Accidents
Upgrades.Description: More accurate readings make it easier to tell how likely an oil well is to blow. Blowout chance for oil wells visible.

Upgrades.Name: Amateur Prospectors
Upgrades.Description: You have hired some of the locals who purport to be prospectors. You've heard they're pretty good. Slightly improved prospecting.

Upgrades.Name: Pressure Control
Upgrades.Description: It is now possible for us to control the pressure down there, leading to reduced risk of accidents. Reduces chance of blowout by half.

Upgrades.Name: Expert Prospectors
Upgrades.Description: You're now able to hire some expert prospectors. Better accuracy when prospecting regions.

Upgrades.Name: Pipelines
Upgrades.Description: Make it easier to transport your oil to buys. You're able to sell oil at a higher profit.
